column4: it has far better driver support than linux
what, I have to base my opinion on _fact_? :O
its all individual, i dont mind windows. I prefer BSD to linux personally
its a tool for a job
we found a fanboy! may we burn him?
i'm far from it. I dont use 1 OS, I use many to achieve my goals. The statement "windows sucks" is less than meaningless
I could rattle off a tonne of reasons why linux sucks and a good many why bsd sucks

hey.  You suggested I used blkid to see my device UUIDs.  I did, they all match everything in /etc/fstab and /etc/crypttab.  Got any idea why my boot fails with "ALERT! /dev/disk/by-uuid/xxxxxxxx-xxxx-etc. not found"?
you could resetup grub to make it use the right IDs
also, where does grub store UUIDs?
in /etc/fstab. it may be a bug, are you using jaunty?
then you know what factoid i'm gonna fire then dont you :0
well, if /etc/fstab agrees with blkid, what would updating grub change?
not sure, maybe jaunty does things differently. head into #ubuntu+1
